< int BZ_API(BZ2_bzDecompressInit) 
<                      ( bz_stream* strm, 
<                        int        verbosity,
<                        int        small )
< {
<    DState* s;
< 
<    if (!bz_config_ok()) return BZ_CONFIG_ERROR;
< 
<    if (strm == NULL) return BZ_PARAM_ERROR;
<    if (small != 0 && small != 1) return BZ_PARAM_ERROR;
<    if (verbosity < 0 || verbosity > 4) return BZ_PARAM_ERROR;
< 
<    if (strm->bzalloc == NULL) strm->bzalloc = default_bzalloc;
<    if (strm->bzfree == NULL) strm->bzfree = default_bzfree;
<

<    if (s == NULL) return BZ_MEM_ERROR;
<    s->strm                  = strm;
<    strm->state              = s;
<    s->state                 = BZ_X_MAGIC_1;
<    s->bsLive                = 0;
<    s->bsBuff                = 0;
<    s->calculatedCombinedCRC = 0;
<    strm->total_in_lo32      = 0;
<    strm->total_in_hi32      = 0;
<    strm->total_out_lo32     = 0;
<    strm->total_out_hi32     = 0;
<    s->smallDecompress       = (Bool)small;
<    s->ll4                   = NULL;

<          if (action != BZ_FINISH) return BZ_SEQUENCE_ERROR;
<          if (s->avail_in_expect != s->strm->avail_in) 
<             return BZ_SEQUENCE_ERROR;
<          progress = handle_compress ( strm );
<          if (!progress) return BZ_SEQUENCE_ERROR;
<          if (s->avail_in_expect > 0 || !isempty_RL(s) ||
<              s->state_out_pos < s->numZ) return BZ_FINISH_OK;
<          s->mode = BZ_M_IDLE;
<          return BZ_STREAM_END;
<    }
<    return BZ_OK; 
< }

< 
< int BZ_API(BZ2_bzCompressEnd)  ( bz_stream *strm )
< {
<    EState* s;
<    if (strm == NULL) return BZ_PARAM_ERROR;
<    s = strm->state;
<    if (s == NULL) return BZ_PARAM_ERROR;
<    if (s->strm != strm) return BZ_PARAM_ERROR;
< 
<    if (s->arr1 != NULL) BZFREE(s->arr1);
<    if (s->arr2 != NULL) BZFREE(s->arr2);
<    if (s->ftab != NULL) BZFREE(s->ftab);

<    return BZ_OK;
< }

<          if (action == BZ_RUN) {
<             progress = handle_compress ( strm );
<             return progress ? BZ_RUN_OK : BZ_PARAM_ERROR;

< int BZ_API(BZ2_bzDecompress) ( bz_stream *strm )
< {

< static
< void generateMTFValues ( EState* s )
< {
<    UChar   yy[256];
<    Int32   i, j;
<    Int32   zPend;
<    Int32   wr;
<    Int32   EOB;
< 
<    
<    UInt32* ptr   = s->ptr;
<    UChar* block  = s->block;
<    UInt16* mtfv  = s->mtfv;
< 
<    makeMaps_e ( s );
<    EOB = s->nInUse+1;
< 
<    for (i = 0; i <= EOB; i++) s->mtfFreq[i] = 0;
< 
<    wr = 0;
<    zPend = 0;
<    for (i = 0; i < s->nInUse; i++) yy[i] = (UChar) i;
< 
<    for (i = 0; i < s->nblock; i++) {
<       UChar ll_i;
<       AssertD ( wr <= i, "generateMTFValues(1)" );
<       j = ptr[i]-1; if (j < 0) j += s->nblock;
<       ll_i = s->unseqToSeq[block[j]];
<       AssertD ( ll_i < s->nInUse, "generateMTFValues(2a)" );

< }

< static
< void bsPutUInt32 ( EState* s, UInt32 u )
< {
<    bsW ( s, 8, (u >> 24) & 0xffL );
<    bsW ( s, 8, (u >> 16) & 0xffL );
<    bsW ( s, 8, (u >>  8) & 0xffL );
<    bsW ( s, 8,  u        & 0xffL );
< }
< 
< 
< 
< static
< void bsPutUChar ( EState* s, UChar c )
< {
<    bsW( s, 8, (UInt32)c );
< }
< 
<

< 
< static
< void bsFinishWrite ( EState* s )
< {
<    while (s->bsLive > 0) {
<       s->zbits[s->numZ] = (UChar)(s->bsBuff >> 24);
<       s->numZ++;
<       s->bsBuff <<= 8;
<       s->bsLive -= 8;
<    }
< }
< 
< 
< 
< #define bsNEEDW(nz)                           \
< {                                             \
<    while (s->bsLive >= 8) {                   \
<       s->zbits[s->numZ]                       \
<          = (UChar)(s->bsBuff >> 24);          \
<       s->numZ++;                              \
<       s->bsBuff <<= 8;                        \
<       s->bsLive -= 8;                         \
<    }                                          \
< }
< 
< 
< 
< static
< __inline__
< void bsW ( EState* s, Int32 n, UInt32 v )
< {
<    bsNEEDW ( n );
<    s->bsBuff |= (v << (32 - s->bsLive - n));
<    s->bsLive += n;

< 
< static
< void bsPutUInt32 ( EState* s, UInt32 u )
< {
<    bsW ( s, 8, (u >> 24) & 0xffL );
<    bsW ( s, 8, (u >> 16) & 0xffL );
<    bsW ( s, 8, (u >>  8) & 0xffL );
<    bsW ( s, 8,  u        & 0xffL );
< }
< 
< 
< 
< static
< void bsPutUChar ( EState* s, UChar c )
< {
<    bsW( s, 8, (UInt32)c );
< }
<

< 
< static
< void bsFinishWrite ( EState* s )
< {
<    while (s->bsLive > 0) {
<       s->zbits[s->numZ] = (UChar)(s->bsBuff >> 24);
<       s->numZ++;
<       s->bsBuff <<= 8;
<       s->bsLive -= 8;
<    }
< }
< 
< 
< 
< #define bsNEEDW(nz)                           \
< {                                             \
<    while (s->bsLive >= 8) {                   \
<       s->zbits[s->numZ]                       \
<          = (UChar)(s->bsBuff >> 24);          \
<       s->numZ++;                              \
<       s->bsBuff <<= 8;                        \
<       s->bsLive -= 8;                         \
<    }                                          \
< }
< 
< 
< 
< static
< __inline__
< void bsW ( EState* s, Int32 n, UInt32 v )
< {
<    bsNEEDW ( n );
<    s->bsBuff |= (v << (32 - s->bsLive - n));
<    s->bsLive += n;

< #define BZ_INITIALISE_CRC(crcVar)              \
< {                                              \
<    crcVar = 0xffffffffL;                       \
< }
< 
< #define BZ_FINALISE_CRC(crcVar)                \
< {                                              \
<    crcVar = ~(crcVar);                         \
< }
< 
< #define BZ_UPDATE_CRC(crcVar,cha)              \
< {                                              \
<    crcVar = (crcVar << 8) ^                    \

< {

<  Int32 BZ2_decompress ( DState* s ) {    Int32  i;    Int32  t;    Int32  alphaSize;    Int32  nGroups;    Int32  nSelectors;    Int32  nextSym;    if (s->state == BZ_X_MAGIC_1) {    }    switch (s->state) {       for (i = 0; i < nSelectors; i++) {          while (True) {          }       }       {          for (i = 0; i < nSelectors; i++) {          }       }       for (t = 0; t < nGroups; t++) {          for (i = 0; i < alphaSize; i++) {          }          BZ2_hbCreateDecodeTables (           );       }       {          Int32 ii, jj, kk;          for (ii = 256 / MTFL_SIZE - 1; ii >= 0; ii--) {             for (jj = MTFL_SIZE-1; jj >= 0; jj--) {             }          }       }       while (True) {          if (nextSym == BZ_RUNA || nextSym == BZ_RUNB) {             do {             }                while (nextSym == BZ_RUNA || nextSym == BZ_RUNB);             {                Int32 ii, jj, kk, pp, lno, off;                UInt32 nn;                if (nn < MTFL_SIZE) {                   while (nn > 3) {                   }                   if (s->mtfbase[0] == 0) {                      for (ii = 256 / MTFL_SIZE-1; ii >= 0; ii--) {                         for (jj = MTFL_SIZE-1; jj >= 0; jj--) {                         }                      }                   }                }             }          }       }       if (s->smallDecompress) {          if (s->blockRandomised) {          }       }    } }

<  int BZ_API(BZ2_bzCompress) ( bz_stream *strm, int action ) {    EState* s;    switch (s->mode) {          if (action == BZ_RUN) {          }  	 if (action == BZ_FLUSH) {          }          if (s->avail_in_expect > 0 || !isempty_RL(s) ||              s->state_out_pos < s->numZ) return BZ_FINISH_OK;    } }
